body:
Can you reproduce? I'd really need to see a tcpdump of the issue happening because the error message is insufficient. I.e.

> sudo tcpdump -i $IFACE -s 9999 -w /tmp/dump

And then run git in a loop until it reproduces.

Also note that these things are often caused by middleware (either on the network or the local machine) doing silly things so it's a good idea to see whether there's a likely candidate around.
